member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Schedule.SfSchedule.SelectedDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the selected .
member.remarks: In month view, cells are selected based on SelectedDate and in time slot views timeslot will be selected if the time was within the timeslots range. When the SelectedDate changed, only selection changes and for navigation to SelectedDate (if not in view), use DisplayDate property. Selection before and beyond using the SelectedDate is not possible.
